item.title:
Scarlett Johansson says getting turned down for ‘Gravity’ left her “hopeless”:
“I got turned down for two roles — the first was ‘Iron Man 2’ and then the other one was Alfonso Cuarón’s ‘Gravity,' I had wanted that role so much. It was sort of the straw that broke the camel’s… Show more
item.author: popcrave

item.title:
Jennifer Garner talks about the problem with being perceived as “always nice”:
“when I have any kind of boundary, people think of it as much more than it actually is. The problem is being recognized on a day where I’m not so nice or when I have blackness in my soul. I’ve… Show more
item.author: popcrave
